message: Hi everyone. Rod Jones here, from the old Dramatica Mail List. I sure do miss it. Does anyone know what happened or if it is coming back? I emailed Chris about the list being down several months ago and he directed me here. Where is everyone hanging out these days?

This place is great...if you don't mind waiting 2 minutes for the page to load. I think there's a Yahoo group somewhere. There is a Dramatica Chat room(s) setup over at HipChat. If you Message me your email I can set you up.
